code: import React from'react';import Swal from"sweetalert2";import'./contactForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactForm=()=>{const onSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData(event.target);formData.append("access_key","1f0bb492-3764-4d30-a5e2-8a62164bf223");const object=Object.fromEntries(formData);const json=JSON.stringify(object);const res=await fetch("https://api.web3forms.com/submit",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Accept:"application/json"},body:json}).then(res=>res.json());if(res.success){Swal.fire({title:"Success!",text:"Message sent successfully!",icon:"success"});event.target.reset();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contactFormWrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Say ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Hello"})," \uD83D\uDC4B"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",id:"name",required:true,placeholder:"Name",minLength:"2",maxLength:"50",autoComplete:"name","aria-label":"Full Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"mobile",id:"mobile",required:true,placeholder:"Mobile no",minLength:"10",maxLength:"15",pattern:"[0-9]{10,15}",title:"Please enter a valid mobile number",autoComplete:"tel","aria-label":"Mobile Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",id:"email",placeholder:"Email Address",autoComplete:"email","aria-label":"Email Address",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",id:"message",placeholder:"Message",minLength:"10",maxLength:"500","aria-label":"Message",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"submit",children:["Send Message ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-send-plane-fill"})]})]})});};export default ContactForm;
